level.heading: Penalties.
level.text: Any director, officer, manager, agent, or employee of an eligible financial institution who knowingly violates a provision of this subchapter may, upon conviction, be fined not less than $500 nor more than $2,000.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-351.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-56
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-56, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-351.01.
